name: Mitigation Playbook for Network Sniffing Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident involving an unauthorized device capturing network traffic.

action--c3c181b2-fca0-4dc6-b640-8b7bf0b8.name: Disconnect unauthorized device
action--c3c181b2-fca0-4dc6-b640-8b7bf0b8.description: Immediately disconnect the unauthorized device from the network.

action--ad68c1c3-bf3c-4b51-a4d7-3f67c7ea.name: Monitor network for anomalies
action--ad68c1c3-bf3c-4b51-a4d7-3f67c7ea.description: Start monitoring the network for any anomalies.

while-condition--monitor-anomalies.name: Check for anomalies
while-condition--monitor-anomalies.description: Loop to continue monitoring until no anomalies are detected.

action--4cf39b55-0f1e-4d0d-b5ac-d8b575f5.name: Conduct a full network scan
action--4cf39b55-0f1e-4d0d-b5ac-d8b575f5.description: Conduct a network scan to identify unauthorized devices.
